# AdditionalExercisePackage

The goal of AdditionalExercisePackage is to illustrate the main steps of
your package preparation.

## Installation

You can install the development version of AdditionalExercisePackage
from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("DaCM2025/AdditionalExercisePackage")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

``` r
library(AdditionalExercisePackage)
## basic example code
```

Below explain how your package works, what are the functions and so onâ€¦

# Package index

## All functions

- [`Person_class()`](https://github.com/DaCM2025/AdditionalExercisePackage/reference/Person_class.md)
  : Person_class object
- [`` `%r%` ``](https://github.com/DaCM2025/AdditionalExercisePackage/reference/grapes-r-grapes.md)
  : Fitted linear model
- [`print_info(`*`<Person_class>`*`)`](https://github.com/DaCM2025/AdditionalExercisePackage/reference/print_info.Person_class.md)
  : Print method for a class Person_class
- [`print_info()`](https://github.com/DaCM2025/AdditionalExercisePackage/reference/print_info.md)
  : Generic function print_info
- [`snipes`](https://github.com/DaCM2025/AdditionalExercisePackage/reference/snipes.md)
  : Snipes price data
